channel.title: Need 1 Question Resloved ASAP
channel.description:
Can Moparscape Be Played Offline?
Basically With No Internet Connection?
Cheers. ;)

item.title: Need 1 Question Resloved ASAP
item.dc:creator: @im_hard im hard
item.description:
@im_hard wrote:

Yes, you can connect to your OWN server if you don’t have an internet connection.

Altough, to compile you will need to download JDK which requires an internet connection.

To connect offline just simpely change your client ip to 127.0.0.1 and run your server source, enjoy

Read full topic

item.title: Need 1 Question Resloved ASAP
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Barter Owner Barter
item.description:
@Owner_Barter wrote:

[quote=“pk3r john, post:8, topic:299996”][quote author=Noob Skiller link=topic=396292.msg2944014#msg2944014 date=1252100775]

You just run your server, then run client and connect either to localhost 127.0.0.1 and that’s it.

You don’t need a tut.

I’ve played so many times on mine when i had no internet connection

I downloaded Mopascape 3.2, I unpacked it and when ever I run it, the loading screen appears for 1 second and then disappears. I’m not connected to the internet and not connected to any networks

[/quote]

I think you messed up the cache or something.[/quote]
Or maybe he doesnt have jdk?

Read full topic

item.title: Need 1 Question Resloved ASAP
item.dc:creator: @Noob_Skiller Noob Skiller
item.description:
@Noob_Skiller wrote:

[quote=“Mitko, post:3, topic:299996”]You mean if you can play your server without having internet?
Then yes, you can. Just connect to localhost and you can play.[/quote]

Thank you for the quick response, could you possibly give me a tutorial or give me a link if it has already been done on the forum. And also thank you fat cookies

EDIT:

I downloaded Mopascape 3.2, I unpacked it and when ever I run it, the loading screen appears for 1 second and then disappears. I’m not connected to the internet and not connected to any networks

Thanks Again
